CandidateProfile.hr:ExecutiveSummary: Experienced Information Technology Consultant with a demonstrated history of working in the management consulting industry. Skilled in Reporting, Databases, Data Warehousing, Software Documentation, and Visual Basic for Applications (VBA). Strong information technology professional with a Master of Business Administration (MBA) focused in DSC from Miami University. In this new decade, I am looking forward to apply my newly acquired knowledge of JavaScript to embrace new challenges in web developments.
